name: Up Jump!
description:
Up Jump is a game about jumping onwards and upwards. Avoid spikes, saws and other nastiness as you make you way through many vibrant and glorious worlds.

The game features:

-Several unlockable worlds
-Quirky little animals and other awesomely cute character
-Endless platforms to jump on
-Ear tickling tunes
-Super simple and intuitive controls

This game is best played whilst sitting on a bus, train, or in your room with the lights dimmed.

Good luck and thanks for playing!
